title: Bronze Top and Mid Main looking for a team
body:
Hey guys,

I'm a bronze player that is really hoping there is a team that might pick me up. I main top and mid (as the title suggests) and can scrim weekends. 

oce.op.gg/swagondang

replies.body: i'm up for duoing or joining teams. i'm just a support main with mid as my secondary option, but i'm bronze 1 and i have a group of friends i sometimes play with who might be willing to team up. its a relatively open discord server, but i'm always open to queuing on my own. i usually play in the evenings during the school week (nz time) and almost all day during the weekends. if you want to play sometime, my league name is checkeredartist (duh lol) and my discord number is 3351.
